benchmark_details.name: OAEI-LLM
benchmark_details.overview: A Benchmark Dataset for Understanding Large Language Model Hallucinations in Ontology Matching.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure the degree of hallucination by LLMs in ontology matching tasks.
tasks: Evaluate LLM hallucinations in ontology matching
Provide baseline references for fine-tuning LLMs
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset only demonstrates one-to-one equivalent mappings.

data.annotation: Records LLM-generated results and categorizes hallucinations.

methodology.calculation: Comparison of LLM-generated mappings with human-labelled results.
methodology.interpretation: Understanding types of hallucinations and their impact on matching performance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: OAEI data policy allows public availability subject to usage policies.
